entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who attacked Mr. Weasley with his snake.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as being unnerved by Harry's question.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one asking questions and trying to figure out what Voldemort wants.

entities.name: department of mysteries
entities.description: The Department of Mysteries is a location that Harry has been dreaming about and thinks Voldemort wants something from.

entities.name: voldemort's snake
entities.description: Voldemort's snake is the one that attacked Mr. Weasley.

relationships.description: Harry has recognized the corridor leading to the Department of Mysteries.
Voldemort wants something from the Department of Mysteries, according to Harry's thoughts.
Snape is unnerved by Harry's question about the Department of Mysteries.
Voldemort has attacked Mr. Weasley, who was being protected by Snape.
